newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia CPI seen up 0.41 pct in October.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia CPI seen up 0.41 pct in October.

text.p: Indonesia's consumer price index rose 0.41 percent in October compared to a decline of 0.04 percent in September, official sources said on Wednesday.
The sources gave no further details.
The government is due to announce full details after the monthly cabinet meeting on the economy ends around 0500 GMT.
